short_description.message: Event application that serves a broad variety of needs for EDUs and NGOs.

description.message:
The Summit Events App is a sustainable open source community events app that serves a broad variety of needs for EDUs and NGOs. The event solution has the flexibility needed to offer events of different types: paid, free, group, guests, and individual. The solution will include the full life cycle of the event: registration, receipting, confirmation, reporting and web faced exposure. This solution facilitates a Salesforce connected campus and will be compatible with Salesforce.org’s Data Architectures.
Resources:

- [Installation Guide](https://sfdo-community-sprints.github.io/summit-events-app-documentation/)
- [Open source GitHub repository](https://github.com/SFDO-Community-Sprints/Summit-Events-App/wiki)
- [Summit Events App version release notes]( https://sfdo-community-sprints.github.io/summit-events-app-documentation/docs/release-notes/)
- Learn more and get support: [Trailblazer Community](https://trailhead.salesforce.com/trailblazer-community/groups/0F94S000000kHi2?tab=discussion). Please login to the Power of Us Hub, and post your question to the Summit Events App group. Maintainers of this application and Salesforce.org Open Source Program team members actively monitor every post.

![Summit-Events-App logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SFDO-Community-Sprints/Summit-Events-App/master/images/Summit%20Events%20App%20Badge%20fv.png)
